title: thethe13
author: thethe13
content: What do you think about Better fan? İt is future of trading soccer.

comments.author: makishart
comments.body: What's purpose to create a new account to shill your token? There was also a threat that was discussed about better fan if you were digging a little bit. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5443190.0If you were still trying to shill it by creating new account and i think that will be just only ruining the reputation of better fan. It's not something new. I prefer to use trusted reputable site like stake rather than it. It's just another new platform that recycle the common idea and mix it with web3.

comments.author: ichsan ardi
comments.body: Quote from: thethe13 on March 08, 2023, 01:00:27 PMWhat do you think about Better fan? İt is future of trading soccer. I think for fans buying club tokens it is a new form of investment for fans who want to own some of their favorite football club because it is involved in decision making within that club.

comments.author: jacafbiz
comments.body: Quote from: ichsan ardi on March 08, 2023, 07:12:40 PMQuote from: thethe13 on March 08, 2023, 01:00:27 PMWhat do you think about Better fan? İt is future of trading soccer. I think for fans buying club tokens it is a new form of investment for fans who want to own some of their favorite football club because it is involved in decision making within that club.DO you know the project is about betting and prediction and has nothing to do with fan tokens? It is better to read about a project before posting or commenting about it. This project will find it very hard to gain market share, the number of crypto betting sites that have sprung up recently is on the increase and you can see most of them are spending very hard to get noticed and they are one of the most carried signature campaigns in the space. So the team needs to work harder rather than spamming the forum with their thread

comments.author: cryptomaniac_xxx
comments.body: Quote from: ichsan ardi on March 08, 2023, 07:12:40 PMQuote from: thethe13 on March 08, 2023, 01:00:27 PMWhat do you think about Better fan? İt is future of trading soccer. I think for fans buying club tokens it is a new form of investment for fans who want to own some of their favorite football club because it is involved in decision making within that club.No it's not, I have seen this trend as far back as 2018 and I will say that it's not very successful strategy. And if I'm not mistaken, there is a token around the World Cup and obviously after the event, the token price goes down hard.So it might be successful in the beginning, specially for fans that are supporting their club.But sooner or later there will be times that the token price will go down, in my opinion.

comments.author: nara1892
comments.body: Previously I also saw a thread similar to this which discussed the same project, namely Better Fan and of course with a new account created.Does it really have to be like this to carry out token promotions so that they are in demand? I do not think so. Precisely with this it makes people think why should it be promoted with lots of new accounts created At least in this case when your project really can be held accountable, you should also be better at token promotions like this.
